The Eric Epic

The story of a boy who grew up not knowing he was a vampire and the day that all changed.

This Guy Gerould

I wrote this for English class in my junior year of high school (Nuh Een Oozhih). It was supposed to be serious, so I got a REDO. Worth it.

Da Enuma Elish

Heh. This is a rendition of The Enuma Elish. (Un Naa Oozheh).

To Mine Tenant

We were given this assignment at the beginning of my senior year of high school in English class. (Oozheh) I think I was the only one that did anything like it. I don't want to give it away. "Tenant, a word."
